subject: Baseball
Blacks
Race and Ethnicity
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: The total of black and Hispanic major league managers climbed to 10 in 2008, but Lloyd McClendon is the only current one, and Commissioner Rob Manfred is considering a solution.
snippet: The total of black and Hispanic major league managers climbed to 10 in 2008, but Lloyd McClendon is the only current one, and Commissioner Rob Manfred is considering a solution.
